title: Can't connect a new Service Management tenant with an existing UCMDB Gateway installation
content:
You can't connect a new Service Management tenant with an existing UCMDB Gateway installation.

Cause

The UCMDB Gateway installation was previously connected to another Service Management tenant.

Solution

Go to your UCMDB Gateway installation, open the <Gateway installation>\data\resource\tenant_mapping.json5 file and manually modify:  

  • The smaxId parameter, which is the new SMA Tenant ID.  

  • The ucmdbId parameter, which is the new customer ID. 

Save the changes and restart the UCMDB Gateway service.
